meanings.definition: A person who is experienced or knowledgeable in a particular field or activity.
meanings.sent1: She is a mavins in computer programming.
meanings.sent2: The team of mavins completed the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent3: The mavins at the bakery always know the best recipes.
meanings.sent4: His grandfather is a mavins in storytelling, weaving tales that captivate all who listen.
meanings.sent5: The mavins of the forest guided us safely through the wilderness.

meanings.definition: A group of people who are skilled or talented in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The mavins of the art club showcased their paintings at the exhibition.
meanings.sent2: The mavins of the orchestra played a beautiful symphony.
meanings.sent3: The mavins of the kitchen whipped up a delicious feast for the party.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, the mavins of the team always lead by example.
meanings.sent5: The mavins of the dance troupe moved in perfect harmony on stage.
